title: Free Orpheus
content:
Hells, the House of Hope, may be our best bet.

Find the diabolist Helsik

We found a shop called The Devi's Fee, run by a diabolist called Helsik. We should ask her if she can help us reach Raphael's House of Hope.

How to unlock Free Orpheus

Automatically received after leaving the Astral Plane at the beginning of Act 3.

Free Orpheus Rewards

Free Orpheus Walkthrough

At the beginning of Act 3, you'll be called by your Dream Visitor into the Astral Plane when you rest at the campsite in Wyrm
